channel.title: ffmpeg on Brian Lachniet
channel.description: Recent content in ffmpeg on Brian Lachniet

item.title: Remove a video stream from an MP4
item.description: My kids figured out pretty early how to capture videos and pictures on our tablets. I ran across a video recently that was taking up almost 2 GB of space in my library. I played it back to find that my toddler (at the time) had captured an hour-long video, but had left the tablet on the ground the entire time, camera facing down. The entire video was black, but the audio was pretty adorable.
